Topic

Exploring your future options

AtoZ

  • Assessing skills

    Skills Assessment

  • Careers guidance appointments

    Meet with a careers consultant for an in depth discussion to help you with career planning and career choices.

  • Careers workshops

    We run a number of bookable workshops throughout the year.

  • Drop in careers advice

    If you have any careers based queries or want help booking appointments, come along and talk to our staff.

  • Job search appointments

    Our job search advisers can help with CVs, applications, searching for jobs, interviews and work experience.

  • Skills workshops

    We run a number of bookable workshops throughout the year.
